ComicInfo.Summary: Winter: Queen Jessica struggles to rule the kingdom of Asamando and makes plenty of mistakes as she gets used to ruling an entire kingdom. Losing faith in his former pupil, Mazzul takes on a new Spell Sword apprentice but Jessica kills him when he tries to lead a revolt against her. When Jessica accidentally ruins the economy and causes a war with the orcs, the people depose her and Fox becomes king. Mazzul returns her home to Earth and an uncertain fate.
ComicInfo.Title: Winter
